items.reasons: Water molecules form polar covalent bonds between oxygen and hydrogen atoms

items.statement: ConsistsOf: NaCl consists of sodium and chlorine
items.reasons: Sodium chloride is composed of sodium and chlorine ions in ionic lattice

items.statement: CombinesWith: CH4 combines with O2 to form CO2 and H2O
items.reasons: Methane combustion reaction: CH4 + 2O2 â†’ CO2 + 2H2O

items.statement: Emits: NH3 emits blue light when burned
items.reasons: Ammonia combustion produces nitrogen and water, not characteristic blue light emission
items.suggested_fix: NH3 burns with pale yellow-green flame to form nitrogen and water vapor

items.statement: FormsFrom: CO2 forms from combustion of carbon compounds
items.reasons: Carbon dioxide is a common product of complete combustion of organic compounds
